sentence: A handful of Florida residents are suing the state and its Republican governor, Ron DeSantis, over the decision to dissolve Walt Disney Co.'s special self-governing district near Orlando, saying the move will saddle them with the companys $1-billion debt burden.
author: Ryan Faughnder
title: Disney Florida fallout: Taxpayers sue DeSantis for axing companys special tax status
